EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudMN.Cloud.none.T.G.W.15597.Cloud Digitalization technology_webinar 2.05x
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry you couldn't attend - {{my.EventName:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sorry you couldn't attend the webinar Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, We are sorry you were unable to attend our recent webinar about {{my.EventName:default=edit me}}.
But it’s not too late because it’s now available to view on demand <[[{{member.webinar url}}]]>.
Click here for details about other sessions in the series, and to register for the upcoming events <[[https://pages.nokia.com/Cloud-Webinar-Series.html]]>.
